languages.text: "Загадка?" {n}Глаза Кассии загораются любопытством.{/n} "Было бы крайне интересно узнать, что хранится внутри. Лорд-капитан, не желаете ли попробовать открыть сферу?"

traits.locale_text: "Загадка?" {n}Глаза Кассии загораются любопытством.{/n} "Было бы крайне интересно узнать, что хранится внутри. Лорд-капитан, не желаете ли попробовать открыть сферу?"

languages.text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

languages.text: «¿Un acertijo?». {n}Los ojos de Cassia se iluminan, curiosos.{/n} «Sería muy interesante saber qué se guarda en su interior. Lord Capitán, ¿le gustaría intentar abrir el orbe?».
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Un acertijo?». {n}Los ojos de Cassia se iluminan, curiosos.{/n} «Sería muy interesante saber qué se guarda en su interior. Lord Capitán, ¿le gustaría intentar abrir el orbe?».

languages.text: 「謎かけ？」{n}カシアの目は好奇心に満ちていた。{/n}「中に何が収められているのか、それを知るのはとても興味深いことです。ロード・キャプテン、オーブを開けてみますか？」
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

traits.locale_text: 「謎かけ？」{n}カシアの目は好奇心に満ちていた。{/n}「中に何が収められているのか、それを知るのはとても興味深いことです。ロード・キャプテン、オーブを開けてみますか？」

languages.text: “这是某种谜语吗？”{n}卡西娅的目光亮了起来，充满了好奇。{/n}“如果能弄清楚里面装了什么东西，那一定会非常有趣。你打算试试把它打开吗，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

traits.locale_text: “这是某种谜语吗？”{n}卡西娅的目光亮了起来，充满了好奇。{/n}“如果能弄清楚里面装了什么东西，那一定会非常有趣。你打算试试把它打开吗，舰长大人？”

languages.text: "Ein Rätsel?" {n}Cassias Augen funkeln neugierig.{/n} "Es wäre ausgesprochen interessant, ihren Inhalt zu kennen. Lord Captain, wollt Ihr versuchen, die Kugel zu öffnen?"
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

traits.locale_text: "Ein Rätsel?" {n}Cassias Augen funkeln neugierig.{/n} "Es wäre ausgesprochen interessant, ihren Inhalt zu kennen. Lord Captain, wollt Ihr versuchen, die Kugel zu öffnen?"

languages.text: « Une énigme ? {n}s'exclame Cassia dont les yeux brillent de curiosité.{/n} Il serait très intéressant de savoir ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, souhaitez-vous tenter d'ouvrir l'orbe ? »
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"

traits.locale_text: « Une énigme ? {n}s'exclame Cassia dont les yeux brillent de curiosité.{/n} Il serait très intéressant de savoir ce qu'il y a à l'intérieur. Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, souhaitez-vous tenter d'ouvrir l'orbe ? »

languages.text: "Bilmece mi bu?" {n}Cassia'nın gözleri merakla aydınlanıyor.{/n} "İçinde neyin saklı olduğunu öğrenmek bir hayli ilginç olur. Lord Kaptan, küreyi açmak ister miydin?"
languages.original_text: "A riddle?" {n}Cassia's eyes light up with curiosity.{/n} "It would be most interesting to learn what is stored inside. Lord Captain, would you like to try opening the orb?"
